name: Nena the wind blade
description:
"Nena the wind blade" is my first game at itch.io and Jam.    

      It a platformer that player fire wind blade magic to kill monster. 

thanks for playing.

*Controls*

Arrow key for Move

 X  for  Attack

 Space key for Jump

Art and code:  Falass

Sfx :  from freesound.org

Running sound :stintx

Attack sound : qubodup
